data.name: SelectComplianceDaily
data.value: SELECT effective_date 'date', sum(full_compliance_count) full_compliance_count, sum(dkim_only_count) 'dkim_only_count',sum(spf_only_count) 'spf_only_count' FROM derived_aggregate_daily_rollup dad JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON dad.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY effective_date;
data.comment: SELECT DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) 'date', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' AND r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'full_compliance_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'dkim_only_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'spf_only_count' FROM aggregate_report ar JOIN record r ON ar.id = r.aggregate_report_id WHERE DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) >= @begin_date AND DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) <= @end_date AND (@domain IS NULL OR ar.domain = @domain) GROUP BY DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2));

data.name: SelectDispositionDaily
data.value: SELECT effective_date 'date', sum(disposition_none_count) 'disposition_none_count', sum(disposition_quarantine_count) 'disposition_quarantine_count',sum(disposition_reject_count) 'disposition_reject_count' FROM derived_aggregate_daily_rollup dad JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON dad.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY effective_date;
data.comment: SELECT effective_date 'date', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'none') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_none_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'quarantine') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_quarantine_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'reject') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_reject_count' FROM aggregate_report ar JOIN record r ON ar.id = r.aggregate_report_id WHERE DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) >= @begin_date AND DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) <= @end_date AND (@domain IS NULL OR ar.domain = @domain) GROUP BY DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2));

data.name: SelectHeadlineDaily
data.value: SELECT effective_date 'date', COUNT(DISTINCT dad.domain_id) 'domain_count', sum(aggregate_report_count) 'aggregate_report_count',sum(aggregate_report_record_count) 'aggregate_report_record_count',sum(total_email_count) 'total_email_count', sum(trusted_email_count) 'trusted_email_count', sum(untrusted_email_count) 'untrusted_email_count',sum(full_compliance_count) 'full_compliance_count',sum(dkim_only_count) 'dkim_only_count',sum(spf_only_count) 'spf_only_count', sum(disposition_none_count) 'disposition_none_count', sum(disposition_quarantine_count) 'disposition_quarantine_count',sum(disposition_reject_count) 'disposition_reject_count' FROM derived_aggregate_daily dad JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON dad.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY effective_date;
data.comment:
SELECT DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) 'date', COUNT(DISTINCT ar.domain) 'domain_count', COUNT(DISTINCT ar.id) 'aggregate_report_count', COUNT(DISTINCT r.id) 'aggregate_report_record_count', COALESCE((r.count),0) 'total_email_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' OR r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'trusted_email_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'untrusted_email_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' AND r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'full_compliance_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'dkim_only_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'spf_only_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'none') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_none_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'quarantine') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_quarantine_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass' AND r.disposition = 'reject') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'disposition_reject_count' FROM aggregate_report ar JOIN record r ON ar.id = r.aggregate_report_id WHERE DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) >= @begin_date AND DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) <= @end_date AND (@domain IS NULL OR ar.domain = @domain) GROUP BY DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2));
AND (@domain IS NULL OR ar.domain = @domain) GROUP BY DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2));

data.name: SelectTrustDaily
data.value: SELECT effective_date 'date', sum(trusted_email_count) 'trusted_email_count', sum(untrusted_email_count) 'untrusted_email_count' FROM derived_aggregate_daily_rollup dad JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON dad.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY effective_date;
data.comment: SELECT DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) 'date', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim = 'pass' OR r.spf = 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'trusted_email_count', COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN (r.dkim != 'pass' AND r.spf != 'pass') THEN r.count ELSE 0 END),0) 'untrusted_email_count' FROM aggregate_report ar JOIN record r ON ar.id = r.aggregate_report_id WHERE DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) >= @begin_date AND DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2)) <= @end_date AND (@domain IS NULL OR ar.domain = @domain) GROUP BY DATE(ADDTIME(ar.begin_date, TIMEDIFF(ar.end_date,ar.begin_date) / 2));
